Item 1: You’ve reached the law office of Lewis Spencer. Our office is currently closed. If you have an urgent question, please hang up and call our answering service at 555-0913. To make, change, or cancel an appointment, please leave a message after the tone or call back during regular business hours. In addition, questions may be submitted through our Web site.

On today’s episode of New Business Travel, we’ll talk about the most efficient ways to check your baggage, move quickly through security, and locate your departure gate. Then, I’d like to discuss international travel. Although traveling abroad may seem difficult, it can actually be fairly easy. Let’s look at some simple tips that will help.
